channel.title: Things required to get a client to connect
channel.description:
Hello, i am wondering what all i need to change to get a client to connect. Im using only BCEL, and i need to know what i need to change. So far, i know i need to change the 40000 to 43594, and the 50000 to 443, and the 127.0.0.1 to like world27.runescape.com is there anything else i need to change, or add to make it connect?
Also, do i need to change anything in the loader to get it to run?

item.title: Things required to get a client to connect
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Make your own, or use cherokee.

Read full topic
item.source: Things required to get a client to connect

item.title: Things required to get a client to connect
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok, so would i use the loader.jar they provide? or would i have to make my own?

Read full topic
item.source: Things required to get a client to connect

item.title: Things required to get a client to connect
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

infact, you need to run it as an applet. You can’t login using the changes mentioned. (They fixed it a release after I posted it -.-)

Read full topic
item.source: Things required to get a client to connect

item.title: Things required to get a client to connect
item.dc:creator: @ZyztemX ZyztemX
item.description:
@ZyztemX wrote:

If you want your client to connect why use bcel, just make a loader and pass an appletstub to the client…

Read full topic
